7. Variable Transformation (1/2)
▪ Apply a transformation to all the values of a variable (attribute)
▪ (Type 1) Simple functions
– Apply a simple mathematical function to each value individually
• (ex) xk, log x, ex,  𝑥, 1/x, sin x, or |x|
– Examples
• log10 x is used when the range of values is very huge (e.g., 108, 109 → 8, 9)
•
𝑥, log x, and 1/x are often used to transform data into a normal distribution
x
𝑥
